title: League Causes My Laptop to Freeze After Latest Windows 10 Update
body:
Hi,

Yesterday morning I woke up to an auto update on my laptop. So I let it do that while I was at school for the morning. I come back and I decide to play some league. Logging in the game and picking a champ in champ select were good. No issues. Then when i spawn in game, the screen freezes and the sound distorts. I cant ctrl + alt + delete and have to power off manually. It does this when i spawn, while im in game and at the end of the game. I don't know how to fix this and was hoping someone on here can help me. Just to point out I was play AR URF when this happens. I never tried this in a normal game and it doesn't seem to happen in a bot game & I'm not sure if its the new game mode or what. But I'm too afraid to try in a normal game. 

Thanks.

replies.body: HAVE YOU FOUND A FIX TO THIS YET?

The sound and freezing issue appears to be a problem caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) not interacting properly with league.  Disabling that should get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
right click on league of legend, choose properties, go to compatibility and choose run this program in compatibility of windows 7. then it should be good

Right click league icon and select " test compatibility"  

Follow steps to victory
